events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred at a busy intersection involving their car and another vehicle.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under 'Auto Accident' based on the description of the incident and keywords identified.
An insurance agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to handle the claimant's case and assist throughout the process.
The claim has been officially acknowledged by the insurer and the customer was informed about the next steps in the claim process.
Requested photos of vehicle damage, police accident report, and a copy of the driver's license to proceed with the investigation.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including detailed photos of the damaged vehicle and official police report.
The claims investigation team has started reviewing all submitted evidence and contacting involved third parties for statements.
Investigation into the auto accident was completed. Liability has been established and damage assessment finalized.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repairs and rental car costs was proposed to the customer based on the investigation findings.
Customer provided positive feedback confirming acceptance of the proposed settlement and appreciation for the clear communication.
The claim was officially approved and authorized for payment based on the accepted settlement terms.
Payment for vehicle repairs and associated costs was issued to the customer within the promised timeframe.
The auto accident claim was successfully closed after all payments were made and customer confirmations received.
All case files and documentation related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
